description: Returns a list of all compute node groups associated with a cluster.

parameters.name: clusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The name or ID of the cluster to list compute node groups for.

nested_items.name: computeNodeGroups
nested_items.description: The list of compute node groups for the cluster.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name that identifies the compute node group.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The generated unique ID of the compute node group.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the compute node group.

nested_items.name: clusterId
nested_items.description: The ID of the cluster of the compute node group.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was created.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was modified.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The provisioning status of the compute node group.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page of results returned. If nextToken is returned, there are more results available. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. Using an expired pagination token returns an HTTP 400 InvalidToken error.
